features: Dual Cold Shoe Mounts: Attach microphones, lights, and accessories for enhanced photography or vlogging.
Versatile Screw Design: 1/4" screw hole compatible with tripods, selfie sticks, cameras, and various accessories.
360° Rotation, 180° Tilt: Effortlessly switch between landscape and portrait mode with adjustable angle design for precise control.
Universal Phone Compatibility: Fits smartphones from iPhone 14 to Galaxy S23 Ultra, accommodating devices within 2.16" to 3.7" width.
Secure Grip: Thick non-slip silicone pad ensures stability even with a thick phone case.
Compact and Lightweight: Weighing only 54g, perfect for on-the-go photography and storage.
Durable Construction: High-quality ABS plastic guarantees ruggedness and functionality.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elevate your mobile photography game with the SYNCWIRE Phone Tripod Mount, designed to add versatility and convenience to your setup. Featuring two cold shoe mounts, this universal smartphone adapter allows you to attach accessories like microphones and photography lights, perfect for vloggers and content creators aiming for professional results. The upgraded design includes a standard 1/4" screw hole, providing compatibility with tripods, selfie sticks, cameras, stabilizers, video sliders, ring lights, and various other accessories. This ensures that your photography gear remains adaptable and ready for any creative endeavor. Experience seamless transitions between landscape and portrait mode with the 360° rotation capability. The innovative adjustable angle design lets you achieve the perfect shot without the need for additional equipment like a ball head. Capture videos, FaceTime chats, or live streams effortlessly with the SYNCWIRE Phone Tripod Mount. The 180° tilt feature adds another dimension to your photography, allowing you to angle your phone precisely for diverse shots. Whether it's a panoramic landscape or an up-close detail, this mount simplifies the process of capturing the perfect image. Despite its advanced features, the SYNCWIRE mount remains compact and lightweight, weighing only 54g. This ensures that you can take it with you wherever creativity strikes, never missing an opportunity for a stunning photo or video. Crafted from high-quality ABS plastic, the mount is not only durable but also ensures a secure and stable hold for your valuable smartphone. Upgrade your mobile photography setup with the SYNCWIRE Phone Tripod Mount – where creativity meets convenience.

reviews.reviewText: Muy buena calidad y muy útil para poder compartir el teléfono con la cámara fotográfica.

Supporto per smartphoone che, con la sua vite da 1/4, si adatta perfettaente ai miei 2 cavalletti Manfrotto.E' comunque dotato anche di slitta cold shoe sempre idonea a treppiedi o altri sostegni.La presa dello smartphone è ben solida e ne consente la rotazione in posizione verticale/orizzontale, nonchè l'inclinazione di 45°.Io inserisco lo smartphone avendo cura di lasciare liberi i tasti laterali, quindi senza mettere la morsa al centro, ma più spostata verso la parte bassa dello smartphone.La morsa consente anche l'attacco di un eventule microfono, molto comodo per video.Al prezzo di circa 11 euro al momento di questa recensione, direi che non ci si può aspettare di più quanto a robustezza funzionalità e qualità.Spero di essere stata utile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice quality adapter with useable features!
reviews.reviewText: This mobile phone tripod mount is ideal for vloggers and content creators aiming for professional results.The adaptor is very well made and although manufactured from a lightweight ABS plastic it seems sturdy enough and is of an obvious high quality.The well designed adapter features two cold shoe mounts allowing you to easily attach accessories like microphones and other photography accessories, such as powerbanks etc and also comes with a standard 1/4" screw thread ensuring that it will be compatible with most photographic tripods.The adapter has a 360° rotation capability as well as a 180° tilt feature so meaning that you can quickly shift from vertical format to landscape format without removing the adapter from your tripod.Definitely a recommended purchase for any content creator shooting with a mobile phone who wants to get higher quality professional video.

reviews.reviewTitle: コールドシューが意外に便利で良い
reviews.reviewText: 自撮り棒やミニ三脚に付属しているスマホホルダーも良くありますが、コールドシューが付いているのはホボ皆無なので便利で良いです。上下のティルトは可動範囲が広いですが、パンは一切出来ません。縦位置横位置の切り替えはスムーズです。ただ、下側のシューは縦位置でしか使えないのが残念。デジカメのホットシューに取り付けて、撮影しながらスマホに転送させると投稿に便利で非常に良いです。
